core:process.core:name: Add Item to Basket
core:process.core:comment: Add item to basket using the processor. An item added event is raised but basket savings processing is started but not completed. Subsequent basket savings processing is invoked only on return to the sale prompt.

core:assignAction.core:comment: This is a bit nasty. The UpdateItemTax process will unfortunately reset the itemAdded/basketChanged flags as it processes the tax caculation item. We need these flags to be maintained as they drive the remainder of the basket update.

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: If we are going to apply employee discounts after promotions, we MUST NOT pass the current BasketItem in. This ensures that all employee discounts are removed from the basket before promotion processing, regardless of what the item is. This is eessential because when we come to complete the promotion processing later, we don't know what the basket item was so we always reapply employee discounts.
